content: iris sweater amanoyarns com iris sweater by amy gunderson skill level instructions intermediate collar show in size with smaller needle cast on 96 104 104 104 112 112 112 120 120 sts pm and join to work in the round being small careful not to twist sizes round 1 * k1 p1 repeat from * to end repeat round 1 for 1 increase round knit increase ing 24 24 32 40 40 48 56 56 64 sts small medium large 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x evenly across round 120 128 136 144 152 160 168 to fit bust 32 36 40 44 48 52 56 60 64 176 184 sts shape back neck with short-row finished measurements row 1 rs k14 w&t bust 37 5 41 25 46 49 75 53 5 58 62 75 66 5 70 25 row 2 ws p14 sl m p14 w&t row 3 knit to wrapped st knit wrap decrease with st k3 4 4 5 materials 5 5 6 6 7 w&t 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 7 8 skeins amano uma 25g/230 yd row 4 purl to wrapped st ssp wrap decrease with st p3 4 4 5 #1901 5 5 6 6 7 w&t us size 4 3 5 mm 16 & 32 circular knitting needles & set repeat row 3-4 3 more times of dpns or size to obtain gauge next round knit working together remaining wrapped sts tapestry needle work rnds 1-61 of yoke chart 270 288 306 324 342 stitch markers 360 378 396 414 sts patt will be repeated 15 16 17 stitch holders 18 19 20 21 22 23 times across each round work even in st st if necessary until yoke measures 8 75 gauge 9 25 9 75 10 25 10 75 11 25 11 75 12 12 25 19 sts = 4 27 row = 4 in stockinette stitch with larger needle after blocking separate body and sleeves next round k39 43 46 50 53 57 61 65 68 back sts note place next 56 58 60 62 64 66 66 68 70 sts on holder this sweater is worked seamlessly from the top down in for sleeve cast on 10 12 16 18 20 24 26 28 30 k79 the round yoke increases are worked directly in the charted 86 93 100 107 114 123 130 137 front sts place next pattern 56 58 60 62 64 66 66 68 70 sts on holder for sleeve cast on 10 12 16 18 20 24 26 28 30 knit across stitch patterns remaining 40 43 47 50 54 57 62 65 69 back sts 178 196 218 236 254 276 298 316 334 sts rem for stockinette stitch over any number of sts worked flat body work even in st st until piece measures 10 5 10 75 row 1 rs knit 10 75 11 11 11 25 11 25 11 5 11 5 from underarm row 2 ws purl next
